com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.style.functions

Class CameraFunction<I extends Number,O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.style.functions.Function<I,O>
      • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.style.functions.CameraFunction<I,O>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - the input type
    O - the output type

    public class CameraFunction<I extends Number,O>
extends Function<I,O>
    Camera function. Functions that take camera properties as input (zoom for now)

    Zoom functions allow the appearance of a map feature to change with mapâ€™s zoom level. Zoom functions can be used to create the illusion of depth and control data density. Each stop is an array with two elements: the first is a zoom level and the second is a function output value.

    See Also:
    Function.zoom(com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.style.functions.stops.ExponentialStops<Z, O>)
